posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Mathewson Portrait low grade
posts.post_content:
Hello, I am trying to find a T206 Mathewson Portrait that is very low grade as I do not have the resources to go after a high grade one.  If anyone has one avalaible please send scan and asking price to [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  Thanks

William
